message.body: First ###### gym mishap- hit in the head by metal weight bar. Not fun.
Oh my gosh! Are you okay??
Yeah. Didn't handle it well tho this girl accidentally whacked me while she was putting her bar away. I yelled.
Uh, I think it's fair to yell. People need to be careful in that environment
I didn't yell at her. It was More of a that really hurt kind if yell but I should have been nicer. still hurts and I think it will bruise.
I would have yelled at her!!
If it still hurts you might want to get it checked out. In fact you should report what happened to the staff
I'm already on my way back to #### but I'm gonna ice it. Good size bump on my forehead.
Well if you feel remotely weird, get it checked out right away. Don't mess around with head trauma!
I will. It is sore but hopefully ice will help.
First run post fracture and toe surgery. I'm slow and my endurance is shot... But still felt good!
Yay! And your head is ok?
Head is still pretty sore, but no problems. I'm sure it's just bruised.
